menu.author: Jean-David Gadina - XS-Labs
menu.keywords: XS-Labs, XEOS, OpenSource, Code, Software, Development, Apple, Xcode, Mac, Apps, Operating System, Reverse Engineering, Electronics, Cocoa, AppKit, macOS, iOS, Swift, Objective-C, C, C++, Assembly, x86, ARM, Macmade, Jean-David, Gadina, Switzerland
menu.description: XS-Labs is the home of the XEOS Operating System and related OpenSource projects.

xclean.keywords: XClean, Menu, Menubar, Cache, Clean, Clear, Clang, Derived Data, Module Cache
xclean.description: Xclean is a macOS menu bar app that provides a convenient way to clear Xcode's derived data or module cache.
xclean.title: Xclean

hot.keywords: Hot, Menu, Menubar, Status, CPU, Throttle, Throttling, Limit, Thermal, Intel, ARM, M1, Apple Silicon
hot.description: Hot is macOS menu bar application that displays the CPU speed limit due to thermal issues.
hot.title: Hot

iobrowser.keywords: IOBrowser, IOKit, Registry, Browser, Explorer, IOReg, IORegistryExplorer, Hardware
iobrowser.description: IOBrowser is a macOS application for browsing the IOKit registry.
iobrowser.title: IOBrowser

sensors.keywords: Sensors, Sensor, CPU, Battery, Temperature, Voltage, Current, Power, PMU, ARM, M1, Apple Silicon
sensors.description: Sensors is a macOS application displaying the thermal, voltage and current sensor values.
sensors.title: Sensors

silicon.keywords: Silicon, M1, Apple Silicon, Intel, Compatibility, Universal, Binary, Binaries
silicon.description: Silicon is a macOS application to identify Intel-Only Apps with ease.
silicon.title: Silicon

qemu-manager.keywords: QEMU Manager, QEMU, Manager, Virtual Machine, Emulation, Virtualization, Frontend
qemu-manager.description: QEMU Manager is a macOS graphical frontend to QEMU, a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
qemu-manager.title: QEMU Manager

game-of-life.keywords: Game Of Life, Game, Life, Conway, Cell, Cellular, Automaton, Automata, Math, Grid
game-of-life.description: Explore Game Of Life, a cellular automaton created by mathematician John Conway in 1970.
game-of-life.title: Game Of Life

notarize.description: A notarization status monitoring tool for macOS, supporting multiple developer accounts.
notarize.title: Notarize

ccache-gui.keywords: CCache, GUI, Compiler, Cache, Speed, Optimization, Clang, LLVM
ccache-gui.description: CCache GUI is macOS menu bar helper application for the ccache tool, a compiler cache.
ccache-gui.title: CCache GUI

xeos.keywords: XEOS, Experimental, C99, Library, POSIX, SUS2, Unix, Linux, Memory, Allocator, Boot, Bootloader, Scheduler, ACPI, BIOS
xeos.description: XEOS is an experimental 32/64 bits Operating System for x86 platforms, written from scratch in Assembly and C.
xeos.title: XEOS Operating System

xsfoundation.keywords: XSFoundation, Library, Object Oriented, Allocation, Memory, Debug, Reference Counting, Reflection, Runtime, Polymorphism, Cross Platform
xsfoundation.description: The XSFoundation C Library provides the base for object-oriented C style coding, reference counting memory management with auto-release capabilities, reflection, runtime environment, polymorphism, exceptions, and basic objects.
xsfoundation.title: XSFoundation

xeos-software-license.keywords: XEOS Software License, License, Free Software, FLOSS, MIT, BSD, GPL, GNU
xeos-software-license.description: The XEOS Software License is an attempt to create a new kind of permissive OpenSource license. Once finalized, it should be the OpenSource license used for all XS-Labs projects.
xeos-software-license.title: XEOS Software License

contribute.title: Contributing
contribute.subtitle: Contributing to the XEOS Software License

coding-style-guide.keywords: Coding Style Guide, Style, Formatting, Convention, Syntax
coding-style-guide.description: XS-Labs coding style guide for C, C++, Objective-C, Swift and Assembly.
coding-style-guide.title: Coding Style Guide

codeine.keywords: Codeine, IDE, Clang, LLVM, Project, Workspace, Compiler, Compilation, Build, Diagnostic, Toolchain
codeine.description: Codeine is a new code editor for Mac, allowing editing, building, running and debugging C, C++ and Objective-C code. While not an IDE (yet), Codeine aims to evolve to support complex application projects.
codeine.title: Codeine
codeine.subtitle: Codeine

filesystem.keywords: FileSystem, iPhone, iPad, File, Folder, Permissions, Unix, Disk
filesystem.description: FileSystem is an application that allows you to browse the content of your iPhone disk, displaying file and folders, files contents, and detailed informations about file and folder permissions.
filesystem.title: FileSystem
filesystem.subtitle: FileSystem

c-reference-counting.keywords: Article, Reference Counting, Memory, Management, Allocator, Allocation
c-reference-counting.title: Reference counting in ANSI-C

gdb-tutorial.keywords: GDB, Debug, Debugger, Crash, Memory, Fault, Segmentation Fault, Bus Error
gdb-tutorial.title: GDB basic tutorial

iokit-idle-time.keywords: Time, Idle, Detection, IOKit, Keyboard, Mouse, Input
iokit-idle-time.title: Detecting idle time and activity with I/O Kit

xcode-static-libraries.keywords: Library, Static, Dynamic, Linker, Link, Loader, Runtime, Symbol, External, Definition
xcode-static-libraries.title: Using static libraries with XCode

c-bool.keywords: Bool, Boolean, Type, Data, Syntax, Keyword, ANSI
c-bool.title: Using boolean data-types with ANSI-C

objc-blocks.keywords: Closure, Lambda, Block, Callback, Delegate, Function, Functor, Keyword, Syntax
objc-blocks.title: Closure and lambda in Objective-C

float.keywords: Float, Double, Real, Floating Point, Precision, IEEE 754, Arithmetic, Standard, Math, Sign, Exponent, Mantissa, Binary
float.title: Understanding floats

museum.keywords: Computer Museum, Computer, Museum, Old, Legacy, Performa, Classic, Intel, Cray, Motorola, G3, G4, G5, iMac, iBook, PowerBook
museum.title: Computer Museum
